import React, { useState } from "react"; import './App.css'; import About from "./pages/About"; // Import About Us section import Header from './components/Header'; // Import Header import { Parallax } from 'react-parallax'; // Import Parallax component export default function App() { const [isHome, setIsHome] = useState(true); // State variable to track current page return (
{/* HEADER SECTION */}
{/* CONDITIONAL RENDERING FOR IS-HOME */} {isHome ? (

Advancing Global Health
& Safety Through Innovation


Leveraging groundbreaking research, technology, partnerships, and
innovation to transform occupational health & safety worldwide


) : (
{/* Parallax effect for About Us section */}
{/* About Us Section */}
)}
); }
